page.title: 08Girls'Clothes in Dinas(1985)
page.content: Georgina,8 years old, is wearing a pale blue {towelling tracksuit}with a brown decorative stripe across the front. On her feet she has{velcro {trainers. Bethan is 11 years old, wearing a green {skirt }and a stripy {jumper. The green stripe on her{jumper matches her skirt. She has got white {socks}that come up to her ankles.She is wearing multi-coloured {shoes}. Louise,11 years old,is wearing a pink pair of{dungarees}with a low front,and tucked up at the bottom of the leg.She is wearing a white cotton {jumper},with decorated shoulders and collar.She is wearing pierced star shaped{earrings}with pink in the middle.She is wearing short white cotton{socks}with blue and yellow flowers and a sewn diamond pattern.She is wearing red jelly bean {sandals.
